TopicTitle: 'MERICA! ">CK YEAH! B-52A Stratofortress [With two Hound Dog cruise missiles]

Articles.Content:
![XaGk0N5.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/XaGk0N5.jpg)

After the rather terrible performance of the P-8 Poseidon, I decided to do a replica of the 8 engine B-52A Stratofortress, with extremely good performance compared to the Poseidon. It cruises at 300 m/s and can carry a monstrous combat load, both internally within the large bomb bay and externally on the wings.

It carries about 22,000 units of fuel internally, and has the ability to carry more.

After launching the cruise missiles, you must right click the probe core and set to control here to correct the orientation. The cruise missiles are meant to be launched with the B-52 at cruising speed, and do not make erratic maneuvers with the AGM-28 Hound Dog.

After having read the instructions posted here, you're ready to fly this baby: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/2mjx1z7jgje583i/B-52A-1.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/2mjx1z7jgje583i/B-52A-1.craft?dl=0)

Second would be the wings, to me it just doesnt look right when its sitting on the runway with the wings straight out like that they should be swooping down with the tips almost touching the ground, and finally the landing gear might be a limitation of the game but it sems to sit very high, sorry for nitpicking, but when you see these things everyday characteristics rub off on ya
